title: Add MSc Systems Engineering to Education section

requirements.text: Add a new education entry to the Education component (frontend/src/components/Education.tsx) for 'MSc in Systems Engineering' from 'University of Lagos, Akoka' with year '2026' and status '(In View)', positioned at the top of the education list above the existing B.Eng entry

quotes:
MSc in view,  Systems Engineering
University of Lagos, Akoka.
2026
Add this to my education section of my portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: The MSc entry appears as the first item in the education section
The degree displays as 'MSc in Systems Engineering'
The institution displays as 'University of Lagos, Akoka'
The status '(In View)' is clearly indicated
The entry follows the same card layout and styling as existing education entries
The graduation cap icon is displayed consistently with other entries

constraints: Do not modify the structure or styling of existing education entries
Maintain the existing card-based layout with icons
Keep the chronological order with newest degree first
nonGoals: Modifying any other sections of the portfolio
Changing the visual design or color scheme of the education section
